title: Lead Full Stack Engineer, SWE
description:
Board Intelligence is a technology and advisory firm that supercharges boards with the science of board effectiveness. We build better businesses and benefit society.


Through a suite of AI-powered software tools, evaluation frameworks, and advisory services that distil twenty years of boardroom experience, we improve the efficiency of board processes and the effectiveness of boards.


We work with over 70,000 leaders and 3,000 organisations across the world, with clients across the Fortune 500, FTSE 100, and OMX 30. In 2024 we received substantial backing from K1 Investment Management – the leading B2B Enterprise SaaS investors. We are at the beginning of significant growth, and we’re looking for superb talent to join us on this journey.


As we grow, we’re fiercely protective of our culture and values. Many of us, including our founders, have families and other priorities, so we know the value of a supportive company.


The team is diverse and friendly. We value fun: most days you’ll find a social event or learning opportunity to get involved with, including company socials, away days, philanthropic activities and lunch & learns.

**Our Mission**


We unleash the potential of organisations through the science of board effectiveness, building better businesses and benefiting society.

**Our Engineering Team**


Our Engineering team is responsible for designing, building, and supporting the software that powers our client experience. We take pride in writing clean, scalable code that delivers real impact, and we foster a culture of collaboration, continuous learning, and technical excellence.


We work with a mature, diverse tech stack. On the backend, we use a Ruby on Rails monolith alongside services written in Ruby, Java, Clojure, and Python, all deployed on Kubernetes. On the frontend, we use React to build modern, responsive user interfaces. AI is a key part of our work—both in the tools we build for customers and the ones we use internally to enhance our development processes.

**Requirements**


We are looking for a Lead Full Stack Engineer to join our Stockholm-based team. You’ll lead a group of up to five engineers across the UK, Sweden and Mauritius, providing hands-on development, technical direction and people management. You’ll help shape the future of our platform through hands-on development while fostering a high-performing, supportive team environment.

**Main Responsibilities**

* Driving the successful delivery of complex full stack features and projects, both as a contributor and as a team lead
* Leading, coaching and developing a distributed team of engineers, supporting both their professional and technical growth
* Translating business needs into robust technical designs, ensuring alignment with stakeholders and communicating trade-offs effectively
* Owning and improving engineering standards and processes, including code quality, peer reviews, testing and documentation
* Driving the adoption of internal AI tools to improve the effectiveness of your team
* Championing clean code, test-driven development, and best practices in continuous integration and delivery
* Working closely with our product and design teams to deliver scalable, accessible and user-friendly experiences
* Identifying and leading technical improvements and innovations across the platform
* Fostering a culture of collaboration, curiosity, and accountability within the team

 **About You**


We are looking for someone who combines deep technical ability with strong leadership and communication skills. You will be driven by a desire to make things better – whether that is through great code, improved processes, or supporting your teammates to succeed.

**Required Skills and Experience**

* Extensive experience in full stack development – working with both the backend and frontend
* Strong experience in a dynamically typed language (JavaScript/TypeScript, Ruby, Python)
* Strong experience in a frontend framework (React / Vue)
* A willingness to learn and adapt to new languages and frameworks within our stack
* Excellent communication skills, with a collaborative and pragmatic approach
* Solid understanding of RESTful API design and service-oriented architectures
* Experience working with CI/CD pipelines and modern cloud-based infrastructure
* Confidence working with UI/UX designers and familiarity with design systems and accessibility standards
* An advocate of Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban), test-driven development and continuous improvement
* Demonstrated leadership experience, with the ability to mentor and develop engineers across varying levels of experience

**Benefits**

* + 25 days of Vacation with Advanced Vacation days
	+ Wellness benefits including a wellness hour per week for exercise and up to SEK 2,000 per year for wellness activities
	+ Parental leave with 90% salary coverage for up to 6 months
	+ Comprehensive insurance including Group Life, TFA Safety and Travel
	+ Regular team lunches and fikas
	+ ITP1 + Flexpension
	+ Vision benefit with free eye test & terminal glasses
	+ Tax-free daily allowances for travel
	+ Activities such as conferences, kick-offs, and other events

title: Testare / Testledare
description:
**Testare / Testledare – Digitala tjänster för anställningsstöd**


Vi söker en erfaren testare med goda ledaregenskaper till ett uppdrag i ett tvärfunktionellt team som utvecklar och förvaltar digitala lösningar inom området anställningsstöd. Teamet arbetar agilt och består av specialister inom utveckling, UX-design, produktledning och test.

**Om uppdraget**  

Du kommer att kombinera testledning med operativt testarbete, där det initiala fokus ligger på att vidareutveckla och färdigställa redan påbörjad testautomatisering. Målet är att ersätta befintliga manuella tester med automatiserade testflöden – främst med hjälp av Playwright.


Rollen omfattar även testning av API:er i Postman, webbläsartester i olika miljöer samt arbete i Visual Studio Code och andra relevanta verktyg. Du kommer att använda Horizon för backend-verifiering och felsökning via Kibana.


I uppdraget ingår också test av tillgänglighet enligt gällande standarder, såsom WCAG. Det innebär exempelvis att du använder skärmläsare som NVDA för att kvalitetssäkra tillgängligheten för alla användargrupper.


Du arbetar tätt tillsammans med utvecklare, testare, produktägare och plattformsteam, vilket kräver en god samarbetsförmåga, struktur och teknisk förståelse i en komplex utvecklingsmiljö.

**Kravprofil (ska-krav)**

* Erfarenhetsnivå: Kompetensnivå 3 (4–8 års erfarenhet)
* ISTQB-certifiering
* Minst 3 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av test och testautomatisering
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av utveckling i JavaScript eller TypeScript, gärna med inriktning på frontend
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av testautomatisering med Playwright för GUI-tester
* Vana av att arbeta i autonoma, agila utvecklingsteam
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta enligt Scrum samt god kännedom om agila ceremonier och verktyg som Jira och Confluence
* Mycket god förmåga att kommunicera på svenska i både tal och skrift

**Meriterande erfarenheter (bör-krav)**

* Tidigare arbete i komplexa tekniska miljöer med många systemintegrationer
* Erfarenhet av incidenthantering, drift och förvaltning
* Egen kod i versionshanterade repositories, som kan visas upp vid behov
* Strategiskt testarbete och förbättring av testprocesser
* Tillgänglighetstestning enligt WCAG-standard
* Praktisk användning av skärmläsare (t.ex. NVDA) och versionshanteringsverktyg som Bitbucket
* Automatisering i befintliga system eller parallellt med aktiv utveckling

**Placeringsort och arbetsmodell**  

Arbetsort: Stockholm  

Distansarbete är möjligt upp till 49 % efter överenskommelse med uppdragsansvarig.

**Uppdragets omfattning och tidsplan**

* Start: 15 september 2025
* Slut: 14 september 2026
* Förlängningsoption: Upp till 11 månader
* Omfattning: 100 %

 **Om Rasulson Consulting**  

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Underkonsult på Knowit Experience
description:
**Bli en del av Knowit Experiences underkonsultnätverk – Seniora utvecklare, arkitekter och testare**


Vi arbetar med webbutveckling, mobilapplikationer, digitala plattformar och komplexa lösningar som gör skillnad för både företag och slutanvändare. Som en del av vårt underkonsultnätverk får du som frilansare möjlighet att bidra i uppdrag som matchar din kompetens och dina intressen.

**Vi söker dig som är senior (6+ års erfarenhet) inom:**

* Frontendutveckling – t.ex. React, Vue, Angular
* Backendutveckling – t.ex. .NET, Java, Node.js
* Fullstackutveckling – kombination av frontend och backend
* Apputveckling – iOS, Android eller cross-platform
* Lösningsarkitektur – design av skalbara och hållbara lösningar
* QA/Test (webb och app) – manuella och automatiserade tester, kvalitetssäkring

**Vi tror att du:**

* Har minst 6 års erfarenhet inom din kompetensroll
* Är van vid att arbeta i agila team och nära samarbete med produktägare, utvecklare, UX och digitala designers
* Har ett starkt tekniskt driv och trivs med att leverera hög kvalitet
* Är van att arbeta som konsult och kan snabbt sätta dig in i nya miljöer

**Därför ska du samarbeta med oss**

* Du får tillgång till spännande uppdrag inom webb, app och digitala plattformar hos ledande företag och organisationer
* Vi erbjuder en flexibel och transparent samarbetsmodell där vi hittar rätt uppdrag för just dig

**Så här ansöker du**


I din ansökan fyller du i dina kontaktuppgifter och laddar upp ett uppdaterat konsult-CV. Se till att ditt CV tydligt visar vad du har gjort i dina tidigare uppdrag. För varje uppdrag rekommenderar vi att du:

* Kort beskriver kunden och dess verksamhet.
* Förklarar vilket behov eller problem du hjälpte till att lösa.
* Tydliggör dina konkreta arbetsuppgifter och ansvarsområden.
* Lyfter fram resultatet eller effekten av ditt arbete.

**Återkoppling och urvalsprocess**


Eftersom denna annons gäller en intresseanmälan, och inte ett specifikt uppdrag, skickar vi inte individuell återkoppling på ansökningar. Ditt CV blir sökbart i vårt system och vi kontaktar dig om vi får in ett uppdrag som matchar din profil.

title: Product Designer
description:
**TL;DR** 
 - We’re looking for world-class product designers to help shape Lovable. You’ll lead projects end-to-end, collaborating closely with engineering. We expect a broad range of design skills, and exceptional taste. You’ll join a team at the forefront of AI, enabling anyone to create software.
   

  

**Why Lovable?**
 Lovable lets anyone and everyone build software with plain English. From solopreneurs to Fortune 100 teams, millions of people use Lovable to transform raw ideas into real products - fast. We are at the forefront of a foundational shift in software creation, which means you have an unprecedented opportunity to change the way the world works. Over 2 million people in 200+ countries already use Lovable to launch businesses, automate work, and bring their ideas to life. And we’re just getting started.
   

  

 We’re a small, talent-dense team building a generation-defining company from Stockholm. We value extreme ownership, high velocity and low-ego collaboration. We seek out people who care deeply, ship fast, and are eager to make a dent in the world.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
* A track record of working in high performing, fast-paced startup environments
* A portfolio showcasing successful product work loved by users and produced in high-velocity teams
* Talent for simplifying complicated user journeys into intuitive experiences
* Strong prototyping abilities with emphasis on clear visual communication
* Fluency with design systems and technical implementations
* Outstanding command of visual design, UI patterns, and interaction principles
* High aptitude for shipping and learning extraordinarily quickly
* Bonus: You ship to production, perhaps with a little help from AI
* Bonus: Experience designing AI products


**What You’ll Do**
**In one sentence:** 
 Design Lovable, making it the most Lovable piece of software ever.
   

  

* Craft detailed user flows and high-fidelity mockups for new features
* Own design projects from conception to delivery, collaborating with engineering or ideally implementing yourself with AI (we'll train you)
* Be scrappy and hands on with any design assets needed
* Establish scalable design processes that uphold quality standards
* Champion quick wins and impactful improvements
* Contribute to improving the design quality of Lovable's AI
* Help set the bar for design quality and the culture for how design works at Lovable


**How We Hire**
* Fill in a short form then jump on an initial exploratory call.
* We'll send you a quick take-home asking to present your best work over a loom video presentation.
* Join us for a round of interviews to discuss your experience in more depth
* Join us for trial work lasting 1-2 days remote or on-site. We'll see how you tick and you get to meet the team and explore whether joining Lovable feels right for you.


**Important Note** 
 :
   

  

* Please submit your application in English. It’s our company language so you’ll be speaking lots of it if you join.
* We treat all candidates equally - if you’re interested please apply through our careers portal.

title: 🚀 Internship Opportunity: Join Arfve’s Campaign Execution Team
description:
We’re not just launching earbuds — we’re launching a movement.
 





 A movement for modular, AI-powered tech designed to evolve, adapt, and be kept.
 





 As we prepare for our
 
**global crowdfunding pre-launch** 

 , we’re building a
 
**Campaign Execution Team** 

 — and we’re looking for sharp, driven interns ready to make things happen.
 




  




**💼 What You’ll Do** 
* Execute campaign strategy from concept to launch
* Track KPIs, timelines, and deliverables
* Research partners, communities & marketing opportunities
* Assist with outreach materials and messaging
* Collaborate across product, design & marketing
* Create and post high-impact content across social media



  




**🎨 Roles We’re Hiring** 

**Campaign Creative & Content Team:** 



* 📋 Content Coordinator – organize assets & schedule posts
* ✍️ Copywriter – write compelling campaign messaging
* 🎨 Graphic Designer – design visuals for social & pitch decks
* 🎬 Video Producer / Editor – create short-form video content
* 📱 Social Media Coordinator – manage posts & grow engagement
* 📊 Marketing Analyst – track performance & optimize strategy
* 🧩 UX Designer – improve landing pages & user flows
* ⚙️ Marketing Automation Specialist – build email workflows & triggers



  




**🎁 What You’ll Gain** 
* Real-world experience launching a global tech product
* Training in crowdfunding, growth strategy & influencer outreach
* A portfolio-worthy project with measurable impact
* Potential to join Arfve’s paid core team if goals are met



  




**📅 Internship Details** 
* Duration: 12–16 weeks
* Start: Flexible from August 11, 2025
* Location: Fully remote & async-friendly
* ⚠️ Unpaid to start, with mentorship & growth potential



  






 📬
 
**Apply Now** 





 Send your CV + short intro to
 
**luciana@arfve.com** 





 Let’s show the world that tech can be modular, intelligent — and designed to last.

title: Service Designer
description:
**Vi söker en Service Designer med stark visuell förmåga till vårt CX-team.**
 Hos oss får du vara med och förbättra dagens kundupplevelser – och forma framtidens spel och tjänster. Genom skisser, koncept, prototyper och kundtester hjälper du oss att skapa lösningar som människor faktiskt bryr sig om. Du blir en del av ett engagerat designteam som samarbetar nära produktteam och affären.
   

  

 Svenska Spel står för en sund och hållbar spelmarknad, där spelansvar är en självklar del av allt vi gör. Vi jobbar designdrivet, agilt och tvärfunktionellt med kunden i fokus – alltid med ambitionen att skapa meningsfulla upplevelser som gör verklig skillnad.
   

  

**Vill du vara med och forma framtidens spelupplevelse? Sök tjänsten som Service Designer idag!**
**Vad kommer du att göra?**
 Som Service Designer hos oss har du en nyckelroll i att säkerställa att våra tjänster utgår från verkliga behov och samtidigt bidrar till affärsnytta. Du agerar bryggan mellan olika kompetensområden och ser till att kundupplevelsen hålls levande i hela utvecklingsprocessen. Ditt arbete bidrar till att forma riktningen för hur vi bygger meningsfulla tjänster som skapar värde för både användare och organisation.
   

  

 I vardagen är du med och omvandlar strategier och mål till praktisk design och bidrar med ett systemperspektiv för att förstå helheten i användarresor och tjänstelogik. Du tar ansvar för kvaliteten i designarbetet och säkerställer att våra lösningar vilar på relevanta insikter och är hållbara över tid.
   

  

 Hos oss är du en drivande kraft i att utveckla både arbetssätt och metoder, med målet att höja vår designmognad. Du är med och bygger en stark designkultur inom Tur och Svenska Spel som helhet – där vi tillsammans skapar upplevelser som människor faktiskt bryr sig om.
   

  

 Några av de viktigaste ansvaren och uppgifterna du har är
   

  

* Driva insikts- och designarbete genom användarintervjuer och kundtester
* Skapa, visualisera och testa koncept i tidiga faser för att snabbt validera idéer.
* Leda samverkan - facilitera workshops och arbeta tvärfunktionellt med affär, utveckling, marknad och kundservice


**Är du den som kommer att göra det?**
 Som senior Service Designer tar du en ledande roll i att förvandla oskarpa affärsutmaningar till tydliga riktningar för kundupplevelsen. Du skapar struktur i komplexa sammanhang, sätter en vision för helhetsresan och säkerställer att designarbetet alltid kopplas till mätbar nytta för både kund och verksamhet.
   

  

 Du fördjupar dig i människors drivkrafter och kombinerar data, observationer och marknadsinsikter till berättelser som guidar utvecklingsarbetet. Genom att tydliggöra samband, prioriteringar och möjliga vägval gör du det lättare för organisationen att fatta beslut som stärker långsiktigt värde.
   

  

 I samarbetet med olika funktioner fungerar du som en katalysator som skapar samsyn och momentum. Med ett coachande ledarskap hjälper du teamet att hålla fokus, hantera osäkerhet och kontinuerligt höja ambitionsnivån för kundcentrerad utveckling.
   

  

 Utöver ovanstående sitter du på följande erfarenheter och kompetenser:
   

  

* Gedigen erfarenhet av servicedesign - minst 5 år i operativa roller, gärna inom digital tjänsteutveckling och agila miljöer.
* Visuellt stark designer - med bakgrund inom UX, grafisk design eller konceptutveckling, van att arbeta i Figma och visualisera idéer genom skisser, prototyper och kundresor.
* Insiktsdriven och strategisk - trygg i metoder för kundinvolvering och triangulering av data, med god förståelse för hur design skapar affärsvärde.


**Om Tur**
 På Svenska Spel Tur skapar vi spänning, underhållning och glädje genom några av Sveriges mest omtyckta spel – Triss, Lotto och Eurojackpot. Varje dag ger vi människor chansen att drömma stort, oavsett om det är genom en digital kupong, en fysisk lott eller ett skrap i direktsänd tv.
   

  

 Vi kombinerar lång erfarenhet med innovation för att utveckla spelupplevelser som engagerar och underhåller. Med fokus på ansvar och trygghet ser vi till att spelandet alltid sker på ett hållbart sätt – samtidigt som vi sprider glädje i hela Sverige. Vill du vara med och skapa nästa stora spelupplevelse?
   

  

**Vi är Svenska Spel**
 Vi är stolta över att vara hela Sveriges spelbolag. Varje dag skapar vi spelglädje med omtanke och ger tillbaka till samhället. Med spel som Triss, Stryktipset och Oddset bjuder vi på spänning, gemenskap och drömmar – men vi är mer än bara ett spelbolag.
   

  

 Som medarbetare hos oss är du en del av något större. Vi tar ansvar för att skapa en sund och hållbar spelmarknad där alla kan spela på ett tryggt och hållbart sätt. Vi säger nej till osunda intäkter och arbetar aktivt för att göra spelupplevelsen ännu bättre för våra kunder. Vi investerar också i samhället genom att varje år bidra med vårt överskott till statskassan och genom att vara Sveriges största idrottssponsor.
   

  

 Hos oss möter du en kultur där vi lär oss varje dag, skapar resultat tillsammans och gör det enkelt. Vi är nyfikna, modiga och tror på kraften i att samarbeta. Våra olikheter är en styrka som hjälper oss att utvecklas, utmana oss själva och hitta nya lösningar. Tillsammans skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där vi delar kunskap, vågar testa nytt och alltid strävar efter att bli lite bättre – varje dag.
   

  

*Är du nyfiken på våra förmåner? Då hittar du dem* 
 här
 *!*
**A** 
**nsökan och kontaktuppgifter**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med placering i Stockholm eller Visby med möjlighet till flexibelt distansarbete.
   

  

**Vi börjar hantera ansökningar i mitten av augusti igen men tveka inte med att skicka in din ansökan. Tack för tålamodet och ha en fin sommar!**
 För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Kristofer Öberg, Chef Customer Experience, kristofer.oberg@svenskaspel.se
   

  

 För frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta Team Talent Acquisition, teamta@svenskaspel.se

title: CEx Business Partner - Digital Excellence
description:
**Company Description**
 AbbVie's mission is to discover and deliver innovative medicines and solutions that solve serious health issues today and address the medical challenges of tomorrow. We strive to have a remarkable impact on people's lives across several key therapeutic areas – immunology, oncology, neuroscience, and eye care – and products and services in our Allergan Aesthetics portfolio. For more information about AbbVie, please visit us at www.abbvie.com. Follow @abbvie on X, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn and Tik Tok.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are looking for a CEx Business Partner – Digital Excellence to join our Customer Excellence team at AbbVie Scandinavia. In this hands-on role, you will drive innovation in digital and content excellence, leveraging AI to enhance customer engagement and shape a future-ready commercial model.
   

  

 The CEx Business Partner - Digital Excellence at AbbVie is expected to partner with key stakeholders and therapeutic areas across the Scandinavian affiliate to:
   

  

* Serve as the Customer Excellence Team expert in digital and content excellence, integrating global tools and processes tailored to our go-to-market model.
* Explore innovative strategies to optimize the digital and content approach using AI, driving digital performance excellence and fostering a future-fit mindset for a modern customer engagement model.
* Drive initiatives in other customer excellence-related topics, tools, and processes in line with company priorities.


 The CEx Business Partner - Digital Excellence is part of the Customer Excellence team in Scandinavia and reports to the Customer Excellence Director, Scandinavia.
   

  

 The Customer Excellence Team comprises specialists in various fields, all working as proactive partners to support success and development within the AbbVie Scandinavia business model. The team's purpose is to ensure AbbVie's success in both current and future go-to-market models and to lead positive change within the organization.
   

  

 The CEx Business Partner - Digital Excellence collaborates with other members of the Customer Excellence team.
   

  

**Major focus areas**
* Drive and support Digital-and Content Excellence by ensuring compelling content creation and utilization across Brand Teams in Scandinavia -identifying gaps, suggesting corrective actions.
* Act as a forward-thinker with robust technical, analytical skills and a deep understanding of AI’s place in digital- & content excellence.


**Responsibilities include (but are not limited to):**
* Optimize digital experiences using insights and analytics, focusing on user experience and personalization.
* Optimize cross-channel traffic and suggest enhancements to create seamless customer journeys through digital touchpoints.
* Keep pace with rapid developments in AI and related fields; experiment with AI-powered platforms and applications (e.g., for content generation, data analysis, and productivity) to improve processes and outcomes.
* Serve as the liaison between Customer Excellence and Commercial departments, aligning content excellence with global, regional, and local policies.
* Cultivate a culture of continuous improvement by evaluating performance, gathering customer feedback and satisfaction data, and implementing changes to enhance user experience and business value.
* Act as affiliate Champion in the Global Content Excellence community and be the point person from Affiliate CEx on Global Digital Transformation.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in customer experience, economics, marketing, or equivalent.
* Min 5 years of relevant experience with a proven track record in digital and content management.
* Solid understanding of AI concepts and enthusiasm for GenAI tools, with a willingness to experiment and apply them across tasks.
* Skilled in influencing without authority in a matrix organization and leading through informal leadership.
* Ability to serve as a strong ambassador for change within the organization.
* Strong analytical, planning, and decision-making abilities with a solution-oriented approach.
* Comfortable working both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, evolving environment.
* Fluent in English and one or more Scandinavian languages.


 Additional Information
   

  

**AbbVie Culture**
 At AbbVie, we care deeply about bringing innovative solutions to patients in need. By joining us as a CEx Business Partner – Digital Excellence, you'll be at the forefront of our mission, working in a dynamic and supportive environment that encourages growth and collaboration.
   

  

* All4OneAbbVie: Foster strong interpersonal relationships and teamwork.
* Decide Smart & Sure: Navigate ambiguity and make informed decisions.
* Agile & Accountable: Communicate a clear and inspiring vision.
* Clear & Courageous: Provide honest and constructive feedback.
* Make Possibilities Real: Efficiently plan and execute tasks while adapting to challenges.


 AbbVie is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to operating with integrity, driving innovation, transforming lives and serving our community.  Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled.
   

  

 US & Puerto Rico only - to learn more, visit https://www.abbvie.com/join-us/equal-employment-opportunity-employer.html
   

  

 US & Puerto Rico applicants seeking a reasonable accommodation, click here to learn more:
   

  

 https://www.abbvie.com/join-us/reasonable-accommodations.html

title: Campaign Management Lead (m/f/d)
description:
**We are looking for a**
**Campaign Management Lead (m/f/d)**
**(unlimited, full-time) Join our team at one of our locations in Berlin, Verl or Stockholm – flexible working conditions available**
 At Riverty, we’re redefining how people and businesses interact with financial services across Europe. As our Campaign Management Lead (m/f/d), you will lead a new, cross-functional team at the intersection of data, creativity, and business growth. You'll be responsible for orchestrating full-funnel, insight-driven marketing initiatives for both consumers (B2C) and merchants (B2B) — driving measurable impact across all growth channels.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Lead, coach, and inspire a team of 10 experts in growth marketing, UX, reporting, and market research.
* Foster a high-performance culture focused on ownership, speed, and learning.
* Own the development and execution of full-funnel, international marketing campaigns for B2B and B2C.
* Optimize account-based and platform-based marketing processes to drive high-quality leads and revenue growth.
* Champion audience insights and persona development to inform campaign messaging and targeting.
* Define and monitor marketing KPIs, ensuring campaign efficiency, lead quality, and strong ROI.
* Drive UX and reporting excellence to ensure campaigns meet experience, legal, and brand standards.
* Collaborate closely with Product, Commercial, Legal, and Country Leads to ensure market fit and delivery success.


**Your Profile**
* Proven experience in leading data-driven marketing teams, with a focus on strategic campaign execution across B2B and B2C.
* Demonstrated success in account-based marketing and full-funnel campaigns that deliver measurable business results.
* Strong leadership track record in managing cross-functional, international teams.
* Analytical mindset with fluency in KPIs, marketing performance metrics, and campaign automation.
* Experience in fintech, financial services, or other regulated industries is a strong plus.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills; fluent in English, German is a plus.
* A “can-do” attitude, with the ability to prioritize what truly matters, and the ambition to continuously learn and evolve.


 #EUR35
   

  

**Benefits:**
* At Riverty, you can be who you are. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment and a culture of appreciation, enriched by our employee networks.
* Prioritize your health with supported sports and leisure activities.
* Take advantage of our numerous training and development opportunities! Enhance your skills with training offered by the Bertelsmann University, language courses, or leadership training.
* Benefit from our discounts on Bertelsmann products and financial incentives.
* With our diverse work models, you can tailor your work to your preferences. Take advantage of mobile office, flexible working hours, and part-time models.

title: eCom Analytics & Insights Manager
description:
Marshall Group is the audio, tech, and design powerhouse uniting musicians and music lovers through genre-breaking innovation. Our flagship brand, Marshall, is uniquely positioned with over 60 years of rock ‘n’ roll attitude on stage, at home, and on the go. Our iconic products are brought to life by a dedicated team of 800 passionate employees and sold in over 90 markets worldwide.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
 As an eCom Analytics & Insights Manager in the Global eCom Experience team, you will work hands-on to transform data into actionable insights that shape our eCom strategy and performance. In this role you will support in making sure we have the right tracking and reports to be able to uncover opportunities and evaluate campaigns as well as reporting on the correct KPIs. You are on top of customers' behavior across site and CRM, notice trend shifts when they happen and are well experiences within CRO and A/B testing. Great communication and interpersonal skills will make you successful in this role. You are reporting to Senior Manager, eCom Experience.
   

  

**Roles & Responsibilities:**
* Monitoring the sites and CRM on a daily basis to follow-up on KPIs on both a global and regional level and product category level.
* Continuously monitoring user behaviors and sharing insights with the UX/UI Designer
* Setting plans for CRO and A/B testing and support with evaluations and sharing these with stakeholders
* Creating monthly reports, campaign reports, project evaluations and supporting with quarterly business reviews to follow-up on KPIs
* Managing our eCom Dashboard, report templates, documentations and structures for reporting
* Analyzing and reporting on our CRM data base and helping define segments
* Mentoring the team on how to analyze and follow-up within their area of responsibilities
* Setting up tracking of events in GTM


**You probably have the following experiences & skills:**
* 5+ years experience of similar roles
* Experience in GA4, Looker, Funnel.io, Qlik Sense, PowerBI or similar tools
* Understanding of BigQuery and basic SQL
* Experience analyzing multi-market e-commerce
* Experience of technical implementation of tracking of events and GTM
* Experience with CRO and A/B testing across site and CRM
* Great at creating presentations with clear takeaways and graphs to paint the picture
* Experience from working hands-on with digital/performance marketing and SEO is a plus


**Our pledge:**
 We thrive to foster an inclusive workplace and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, disability, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age or marital status. We firmly believe that Marshall thrives when our employees do, leading to better experiences for our consumers. We encourage applications from all over the world. To enable transitioning from another country for a role at Marshall, we offer re-location support. This support is tailored for each role but always includes visa/work permit application, local authority registration, and home finding service. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.
   

  

**Does this sound like you?**
 We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Microsoft 365 Solution Architect
description:
**Job Title:** 
 Microsoft 365 Solution Architect
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking an enthusiastic and experienced
 **Microsoft 365 Solution Architect** 
 to join our team in Stockholm, Sweden. This role focuses on transforming our Intranet to the Microsoft 365 platform and preparing the environment for the integration of
 **Copilot** 
 and
 **agentic AI technologies** 
 .
 



 You will be responsible for designing and implementing secure, scalable, and innovative intelligent workplace solutions using the Microsoft 365 ecosystem.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:**

 **M365 Solution Architect**
